document.full_text: propeller, the british theater troupe that routinely turns shakespeare into a donnybrook, pumps 'comedy of errors' full of testosterone at the brooklyn academy of music.
document.title: theater review | 'the comedy of errors': giving shakespeare his sombrero and kazoo
